commit message: Initial commit of Temaki Lists project

Persistent lists across app activity lifecycle
New colour scheme
App Icon
Remove unused and commented out code.
Remove build dir from version control

New colour scheme
New icon
Can now delete lists
Now prompts for list name when creating new lists
Many code refactoring and enhancements
Main items list now highlights on select

Editing and Deleting List Items are functional
Contextual ActionBar now implemented.
Slight UI color changes on main screen.

Orientation change crash now fixed.
Now maintaining one instance of the listsFragment instead of recreating it every time a new list is loaded.
Small UI colour scheme changes.

ActionBar Title and Subtitles now changed when they need to, at the right time.
Fixed a lot of persistence bugs with activity lifecycles.
Fixed dialog losing context on orientation change.
Removed configChanges from manifest - let Android do its thing.

Allow Temaki to run on Android devices down to API Level 14
Don't let landscape keyboard extract the UI
Several other bug fixes
Allow create new lists from ActionBar Menu
